scripts.lint: solhint {src,script,test}/**/*.sol && forge fmt --check src test scripts && eslint "**/*.{ts,tsx}" && pnpm prettier --check "**/*.{ts,tsx}"
scripts.lint:fix: solhint --fix --quiet --noPrompt {src,script,test}/**/*.sol && forge fmt src test script && eslint "**/*.{ts,tsx}" --fix --quiet && pnpm prettier "**/*.{ts,tsx}" --write --loglevel=warn
